tosdr.case: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
quoteText: If any part of these Terms is determined to be invalid or unenforceable pursuant to applicable law, then the invalid or unenforceable provision will be deemed superseded by a valid, enforceable provision that most closely matches the intent of the original provision and the remainder of the Terms shall continue in effect.
